name: Coconut Sun Eau de Parfum
about: Fragrance Family:Fresh.Scent Type:Fresh Solar.Key Notes:Coconut, Frangipani, Vanilla.Fragrance Description:This irresistibly delicious perfume is a dreamy holiday in a bottle with enticing notes of coconut water, frangipani, fresh citrus, crisp sea salt, and gourmand vanilla.  Infused with sustainably sourced jasmine from Egypt and upcycled rose, it supports the building of a water project in Ethiopia..About the Bottle:The 7 Virtues was established in 2010 by activist and wellness author, Barb Stegemann. After her best friend was wounded serving in the army, she promised him in the hospital that she would take on his mission of peace. u2018MAKE PERFUME NOT WARu2019 is the mantra at The 7 Virtues, and it is molded into their caps as a reminder. The perfumes are made with natural, fair-trade essential oils, supporting families in nations rebuilding after war or strife..About the Fragrance:This wellness perfume has aromatherapy benefits: good for letting go, protecting your joy, and feeling present. This hypoallergenic wellness scent is infused with organic sugarcane alcohol and made 22 percent fragrance oils for a longer-lasting scent. Layer with other The 7 Virtue perfumes to create your own trademark scent. Use the power of olfactory memory to set your intentions in your daily wellness practice. All of The 7 Virtues perfumes are made without phthalates, parabens, sulfates, UV inhibitors, or formaldehyde.
ingredients: ALCOHOL DENAT, FRAGRANCE/ PARFUM, WATER/EAU/AQUA, BENZYL SALICYLATE, LIMONENE, COUMARIN, LINALOOL, BENZYL BENZOATE, CINNAMYL ALCOHOL, CITRAL, BENZYL ALCOHOL, GERANIOL, FARNESOL, CITRONELLOL, EUGENOL
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Fragrance is intensified by the warmth of your own body. Apply in the creases of your knees and elbows for a longer-lasting, stronger scent. .-After applying, avoid rubbing or dabbing skin. This breaks down the fragrance, causing it to wear off more quickly. .-If you prefer placing fragrance on your wrists, be sure to reapply after frequent hand-washing, as this tends to rinse off the scent. .-Replace fragrance after 12 months. Expired perfumes more than a year old lose the integrity of the original scent... Eau de Toilette or Eau de Parfum?: .The difference lies in the volume of perfume oil. While EDT contains five to nine percent, EDP contains more, usually eight to 14 percent. EDPs, therefore, last longer and smell more intense...Recycling Instructions: The box is recyclable and earned the FSC certification. FSC paper is made from responsibly sourced wood fiber. FSC is an important standard required by The 7 Virtues in all box packaging. The 10 mL on-the-go travel spray is recyclable, simply screw off the top when you are finished and recycle the glass.

shades.shade_name: 1.7 oz / 50 mL eau de parfum spray

reviews.review_text: smells amazing, but LEAKS EVERYWHERE. I feel like i'm going to get 3 uses of this before it runs out from leaking

reviews.review_text: I love this perfume so much. I wore it out and got so much compliments. One of my favorite perfumes!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It smells utterly divine but it leaks so bad, even while standing upright.

This product is my absolute favorite, itu2019s been my signature scent for the past 2 years! Iu2019m on my 12th bottle! I get compliments on it pretty much every single day and my tip would be to layer it with Jergens coconut lotion! Brings out the coconut scent and youu2019ll be smelling great all day

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I'm a big fan of gourmand scents generally (favorite scent is Milk- by Commodity) so this is a bit of a departure for me - but I love it. It's a super nostalgic scent, reminds me of a 2000's beach day, maybe something I've smelled before but can't quite put my finger on. Perfect mix of sweet, sunny, and floral. You can apply just a couple spritz' and it's more of a skin scent, which is my personal preference, but you can apply more to increase projection. Great staying power even when dialed down. Will be a summer staple for me!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Porcelain skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Smell completely amazing!!!for coconuts lovers! the beach in a bottle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The BEST tropical heaven beachy fragrance on the planet! Ellis Brooklyn's Miami Nectar is my second favorite but Coconut Sun is just in a league of its own. This is one of the most gorgeous scents ever. My sister took my travel bottle last time she was here because she also thought this was the best scent ever. We also both love Vanilla Woods andove to rotate these. For summer, nothing beats this gorgeous tropical getaway in a bottle. Just for reference I want to mention that being a coconut liver, I recently purchased Phlur's Coconut skin and it was a huge plastic, cheap lotion smelling let down, which was a shock because I adore Phlurs Vanilla Skin EDP. For beach vibes, Coconut Sun is the where its at for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Got a free sample. I found the scent of the  sample usually lasts longer than the scent of the full size. Smells great!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It's really powdery and floral on me, not the fresh fruity tropical vibes I was hoping for. My fiance said this as well when I asked his opinion objectively. Will be returning :/

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wasn't expecting much from this because I have had coconut scents before that smelled cheap and artifical to me but THIS....this smells like a very classy clean fresh but sweet vanilla coconut. It's a really pretty and smooth scent that gives the vibe of someone who just smells naturally good because they use fancy shower products. It lasts super long too!

reviews.review_text: I received this as a sample and now I am obsessed. It is lovely. Beautiful summer fragrance, sweet but not sickening sweet. I can smell the jasmine, vanilla, and coconut but not one scent overpowers the others.  balanced and beautifully blended

reviews.review_text: This is hands down the best smelling of the summer time coconut scents to me, and the spicy warmness adds depth and also I think it's what makes it last on me for hours. I love to pair it with the SDJ Rio Radiance scent/87 now, they smell similar but the perfume is definitely the more elegant version. This for summer and vanilla woods for cold weather and I'm set

reviews.review_text: Each time I use this perfume, I can smell it on me all day (usually 2 sprays)! I love the coconut smell, and I also appreciate how it wears/changes as you wear it (how it dries down). I layer it with the Ouai body lotion and they pair really well!

Doesnu2019t smell like coconut at all. Reminds me of Christian Dioru2019s Poison. Also, the spray nozzle doesnu2019t work properly, it doesnu2019t actually spray, it squirts a mess which makes it difficult to apply.

I also find it hard upon initial spray, not the soft scent I was hoping for based on the description. The dry down is nice, but just doesn't last long enough to justify a repurchase.  I really enjoy beach walk by Masion Margiela for summer or tropical vacations, and would choose that over the coconut sun by the 7 virtues.

reviews.review_text: Oh boy, do I love all the 7 Virtues scents... and this one is very much included in that affection. It smells just right for the summer, like coconut fun. It's that kind of scent that is totally summer in a bottle without being overly trendy or over used (sunscreen, sweet, candy vanilla like scents). It's definitely got that coconut note but it's nicely muted with a well rounded base. I totally recommend a try if you're looking for something super summery without it being immature and overly sweet.

reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this perfume, but I think there is a manufacturing error and the bottle does not hold the perfume so unfortunately everything spills out. Definitely not so great for traveling especially if you can't guarantee that it stays upright.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The word I feel that best describes the scent of this perfume is intoxicating. It such a fabulous blend of coconut and floral scent. Quite possibly my new fav next to vanilla woods. This one is a win for sure!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am a huge fan of this perfume. I guess I will have to upgrade my size. The only reason Iu2019ve given this 3 stars because on both occasions the tops were loose or loosen easily. Not carrying it around. Just sitting upon my dresser, near other items. I went from having a full bottle used 3 times to a half bottle due to it being on its side. I was so disappointed with this. Perfume gone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am obsessed with this scent! It smells like the nostalgia of Summer and vacation and all of the positive vibes and helps cure my seasonal blues. The fact that it's a clean and cruelty-free fragrances makes it a feel-good purchase and I love that they give back to communities in need.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the mell but it disappears within 15 minutes. This is more eau de toilette than parfum.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The smell is nice and lasts but the lid unscrews itself and leaks if u donu2019t keep it standing upu2026 so make sure to store standing up.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is a sweet coconut vanilla with a touch of tropical floral from the frangipani, a freshness from the sea salt, and is brightened up by the citrus which also adds a bit of tartness to it. It also has that somewhat suntan lotion smell to it which Iu2019ve always loved! Iu2019m a HUGE fan of beachy smelling fragrances, especially for the summeru2026 A few of my favorites for reference: Tom Ford Soleil Blanc, Replica Beach Walk, Nest Sunkissed Hibiscus, and Estee Lauder Bronze Goddess! It reminds me somewhat of Replica Beach Walk, JHAG Vanilla Vibes, Alien Goddess, and Kayali Utopia Vanilla Coco 21, but more citrusy, bright, and tart. So, if you like any of those fragrances or other similar ones youu2019ll probably like this too! The longevity and projection are both great! The one complaint that I do have about it is that the travel spray does tend to leak. Itu2019s a screw on spray nozzle and it needs to be checked regularly, especially every time that you use it because it tends to loosen. Iu2019m very careful about checking it, but I still lost some of the perfume (not much, but still) especially when I first got it and didnu2019t realize the issue. I did take 1 star off because of this, but otherwise everything else is great!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love it. I didn't think I would like it but it smells so feminine. Great for summer!
A beautiful fragrance for the summertime. I went to a family dinner and received compliments.

reviews.review_title: Love! Floral, Tropical, Vanilla, Coconut, Unisex
reviews.review_buyer_description: black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really love this perfume. It's definitely more floral than it is advertised. I typically don't like floral perfumes but this is truly gorgeous. It is tropical and the frangipani really shines though. Dare I say that I get more vanilla than I do coconut. Though both vanilla and coconut are very much present. Another think that surprised me was how unisex I found this fragrance. I was expecting it to be very feminine. Overall, its beautiful. Imminent love.

reviews.review_text: This is one of the best scents Iu2019ve ever smelled, and it surprised me! I was expecting more coconut but the coconut was more of a heart/base note and the tropical florals and solar notes are more noticeable. noticeable.This  (this

reviews.review_text: This is a really well blended fragrance! the coconut and plumeria stand out with a slight hint of saltines and I love the fact that the scent stays true through the wear time and doesn't change (at least on me). I received countless compliments. However, the travel size bottle has a nozzle that is screwed on and not permanently attached to the glass component so it can unscrew over time as you use the perfume and eventually leak the perfume. I ended up losing half the perfume to the inside of my purse, which was heartbreaking ud83dude2d

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_text: This is summer all the way! The scent is natural and fades nicely throughout the day. I have gotten more compliments wearing this perfume than another scent. Intense perfumes give me headaches, so I love that these are light and airy and natural.

Iu2019m all The way sold and will purchase the full size .

reviews.review_title: A little too heavy on the lime for meu2026
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The only thing that is preventing me from giving this 5 stars is how heavy handed the lime/citrus notes are in the opening spray. The dry down is delectable and warm. This scent would do very well during springtime as well. Itu2019s simple enough for frequent wear but complex enough that itu2019s not a bore. I only bought the travel size and donu2019t think Iu2019d commit to a full-size bottle. But 7 Virtues does some great things, excited to see what else theyu2019ll do in the future. And I LOVE that the fragrances are clean.

reviews.review_text: Just got the spray to travel with. I love the smell. Itu2019s light and fresh and makes you feel like yes itu2019s finally summer! I want to see how it wears over time in the heat. I also love that the company gives back u2764ufe0f

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the smell of this perfume.  They didn't have it in stock at the store, so I ordered it online.  Received and perfectly packaged.  I tend to spray on my wrists and neck.  Over the course of the next several days of using the perfume, I noticed a break out, but didn't realize where it was coming from, until today.  Today, I sprayed on my way to work.  Some of the product landed on my neck and the left side of my face, which all broke out.  Now mind you, I never spray perfume on my face, but today there was hint when I sprayed today and clearly my skin is too sensitive for this product.  I have never broken out with any perfume except this one, which really bums me out.  I love the smell.  I think I will just have a very expensive room spray at this point.  Too bad.  Would recommend for anyone who doesn't have sensitive skin.

reviews.review_title: Like a day at a beautiful beach
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_text: I fell in love with the Coconut Sun right away. The longer it sat on my skin the more and more I loved the smell.  The smell lingered all day long, enticing and luring.
